item.title:
Some disclaimers as the fuds are spreading:
I joined Solayer as part of the Fuzzland acquisition. I am not the founder of Solayer, just a core developer. The funds I lost were my personal funds.
Over the past few years, I have grown my wealth by actively investing in ETH and multiple projects. I trade memecoins too, and losing $1M is fine for me—but I just feel really bad about Solana. These cabals are ruining SOL.
item.dc:creator: @shoucccc

item.title: Arunkumar Sugadevan is unrelated to $LIBRA. They only share the same MM. I am super sorry for this wrong info. Arunkumar is in German, while the MM behind is in Delhi and is not Kelsier as well. More info soon.
item.dc:creator: @shoucccc
